channel.title: Gruber on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in Gruber on un01s notes

item.title: Be yourself is the best you could hope
item.description:
Read a story from Daring Fireball. The story has two parts. The first half is about his mother’s death starting from May this year. The second half is about his father and his wedding ring. The whole story adds flavor with this election. You know, Bob Gruber, his father is an optimist at heart.

Waves in an impossible Sea by Matt Strassler: You and I are small, so we think light runs like a rabbit. But the universe is vast, and from its perspective, light creeps like a turtle.
